entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
